channel.title: Comments on: Belfast web2.0 company The Big Word Project gets Wired

item.title: By: John
item.dc:creator: John
item.description: I have found a similar site but with a better design; http://www.linkinword.com/
item.content:encoded:
I have found a similar site but with a better design;
http://www.linkinword.com/

item.title: By: Shay
item.dc:creator: Shay
item.description: Nobody will ever use this, they aren't ensuring that there is correlation between sites and the associated words being purchased, i.e. if you click "panoramic" you get the university of utah, if you click "greengrocery" you get a guy selling traffic solutions for websites.
item.content:encoded: Nobody will ever use this, they aren’t ensuring that there is correlation between sites and the associated words being purchased, i.e. if you click “panoramic” you get the university of utah, if you click “greengrocery” you get a guy selling traffic solutions for websites.

item.title: By: ww
item.dc:creator: ww
item.description: Equally baffled - unless its their attempt at another version of the million dollar homepage...
item.content:encoded: Equally baffled – unless its their attempt at another version of the million dollar homepage…

item.title: By: dahamsta
item.dc:creator: dahamsta
item.description:
Fair dues to the lads if they make money out of it, but that's the stupidest "Web 2.0" thing I've seen yet. The people that actually buy words should be taken outside and shot for the good of humanity.
adam
item.content:encoded:
Fair dues to the lads if they make money out of it, but that’s the stupidest “Web 2.0″ thing I’ve seen yet. The people that actually buy words should be taken outside and shot for the good of humanity.

adam
